subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Higher usage limits than free tier, includes access to GPT-4o, GPT-4 Turbo, and advanced tools. Usage caps apply during high demand.
5x more usage than the free tier, with higher maximum context and access to the Claude 3.5 Sonnet model.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: Estimated 15-25% of active users on platforms offering paid tiers
pricing_analysis.trend: Rapid price deflation driven by competition, with flagship models becoming more cost-effective and highly efficient 'small' models (like Haiku and Gemini Flash) emerging for high-volume, lower-complexity tasks. A $20/month subscription has become the standard for premium consumer access.
